ingredients.content: 100 g pears, cored and cut into eighths
50 g organic puffed rice (white or brown)
100 g fresh mixed berries (e.g. strawberries, blueberries, raspberries), to serve

preparations.content: Place pears, almonds, hazelnuts, pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, coconut, apricots, maple syrup and cinnamon into mixing bowl and pulse <b>Turbo/1 sec/2 times<b>, or until roughly chopped.
Add puffed rice and combine <b>20 sec//speed 3<b>, with aid of spatula.
Serve with yoghurt, mixed berries and carob pieces (optional).
